original_text: When the people saw that Moses was so long in coming down from the mountain, they gathered around Aaron and said, “Come, make us gods who will go before us. As for this fellow Moses who brought us up out of Egypt, we don’t know what has happened to him.”
korean_text: 백성이 모세가 산에서 내려옴이 더딤을 보고 모여 백성이 아론에게 이르러 말하되 일어나라 우리를 위하여 우리를 인도할 신을 만들라 이 모세 곧 우리를 애굽 땅에서 인도하여 낸 사람은 어찌 되었는지 알지 못함이니라

sentences.original_text: When the people saw that Moses was so long
sentences.korean_translation: 백성들이 모세가 너무 오래 걸리는 것을 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: in coming down from the mountain
who brought us up out of Egypt
we don't know what has happened to him
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그에게 무슨 일이 일어났는지 모른다
